title: Personal Account Management, Cat 6 Wiring, Soft-Closing Cabinets
posting_body: ['We are open for business!', 'To help us continue practicing safe social distancing, we are now offering tours by appointment only, or you can always meet us online for a virtual tour.', 'Contact us today to schedule a tour of your choice!', 'Edison Apartments', '100 Long Beach Blvd., Long Beach, CA, 90802', 'Use this link for more info:', '<URL>', 'Call Now:', 'show contact info', 'x 211', 'OR Text', '211', 'to', 'show contact info', 'to contact us.', 'THE LIGHTS ARE ON AT EDISON APARTMENTS', 'This is a 2 Bedroom, 2.5 Bath, approximately 1330 Sq.', 'Ft.', 'The Edison Apartments is a sophisticated and stylishly appointed mid-Century modern landmark primely situated in the heart of thriving Downtown Long Beach.', 'One hundred and fifty-six luxury flats —including six penthouses—offer sweeping views and elegantly renovated interiors.', 'You’ll enjoy a residents-only fitness center and a private open-air rooftop that’s elevated in every sense—lounge by the pool, enjoy a meal, or simply gaze at the ocean.', 'Features', '- Polished Concrete Floors', '- Abundant Natural Light', '- In-Unit Washer/Dryer', '- Operable Windows', '- Tiled Showers', '- Open Floor Lease', '- Yoga Studio', 'Office Hours', 'Monday-Sunday:9:00AM-6:00PM', 'Pet Policy', 'Edison Apartments welcomes cats and dogs.', '2 pets per apartment are welcomed; 45lb weight limit.', 'A $300 deposit is required per pet and a monthly pet rent of $50/ will be collected.', 'Income Requirements:', '2.5 times the rent', 'h55xIZU5K']
